    • Method Detail

      • deal

        public void deal()
        deal the cards to the players

      • play

        public void play()
        A general play between the two players. two cards from each of the players decks are pulled and placed in their rescective piles. when a war happens it calls war();

      • war

        public void war()
        War. If another war happens within war() it simply makes a recursive call of war().

      • takePile

        public void takePile(MasterDeck player)
        take all cards in pile
        Parameters:
        player - the deck of a player
